search.placeholder: Mɔgɔ minnu bɛ jɛkulu kɔnɔ, olu ɲini .

pagination.rowsPerPage: Layini hakɛ bɛ sɔrɔ ɲɛ kelen na .

kick.title: Aw bɛ a ka kicking membre sɛgɛsɛgɛ .
kick.content: Yala i b’a fɛ ka tɔnden gɛn ka bɔ so kɔnɔ wa?

ban.title: Ka tɔndenw ka dagalenw dafa .
ban.content: Yala aw b'a fɛ ka nin tɔnden in bali wa? Mɔgɔ min ye tɔnden ye, o tɛna se ka don so kɔnɔ kokura o balili kɔfɛ.

toast.loadError: A ma se ka mɔgɔw ka lisi doni .

kick.success: Mɔgɔw ​​ye u sen don so kɔnɔ .

ban.error: a ma se ka tɔndenw bali .

invite.button: Mɔgɔ minnu bɛ jɛkulu kɔnɔ, olu wele .
invite.title: Aw ye tɔndenw wele u ka don so kɔnɔ .
invite.inputLabel: Aw ye Matrix User ID sɛbɛn (i n’a fɔ @user:matrix.org)
invite.error: welesɛbɛn ma ɲɛ, aw ye baarakɛla ka ID walima a ka yamaruyaw lajɛ .
